reviewText: Not a big fan of TV so these are great to put in while working on crafts, really like this series of shows
Excellent and inspirational!  Want to get to my quilting immediately.
It's wonderful to watch an artist in their craft. Also, all the history behind it.

All of the Craft in America series is outstanding. It's heartening -- especially in these automated, technology driven times -- to witness the commitment and craft of these incredible American artists, and it's an honor and a privilege to support and help sustain this craftsmanship.
This is one of my favorite shows on PBS, but it appears irregularly.  Since I am interested in fiber arts, this is my favorite of them all.  I have watched it more than once.

Not one of my favorite
There are better  videos in this series
I would try to get them at the library first and see if you like it.
Craft in America series is unbelievably inspiring!  This season does not disappoint.  Being inside the artists' studios and watching them work is such a fabulous experience!
